abstract: JPMorgan faces penalties over Lehman’s collapse; a look at Amazon’s robots, with Nick Bilton; and Eduardo Porter on promising growth in the manufacturing sector.
snippet: JPMorgan faces penalties over Lehman’s collapse; a look at Amazon’s robots, with Nick Bilton; and Eduardo Porter on promising growth in the manufacturing sector.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan faces penalties over Lehman’s collapse; a look at Amazon’s robots, with Nick Bilton; and Eduardo Porter on promising growth in the manufacturing sector.
